Dynamo: - Updated reload animations for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden, Dynamo, and Ivy
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora move speed increased from 3.8 to 4.2
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity T1 radius reduced from +3m to +2m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity falls 70% slower when Majestic Leap down is used (similar to the hero falling slower normally when casting the ability from an elevation)
Ivy: - Updated reload animations for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden, Dynamo, and Ivy
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20} Kudzu Bomb now does 50% less damage to objectives
Warden: - Updated reload animations for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden, Dynamo, and Ivy
Bebop: - Fixed the unit target UI not showing up for instant-cast abilities (MoKrill ult, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist ult, Bebop bomb)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook hitbox reduced from 36 inches to 33
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 100s to 110s
- Seven: {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge now uses the new instant cast option that Bebop Bomb uses
Lady Geist: - Fixed the unit target UI not showing up for instant-cast abilities (MoKrill ult, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist ult, Bebop bomb)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb no longer starts decaying the arm time while in the air
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb arm time reduced from 1s to 0.5s (this is a nerf for long distance bombs)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange T3 changed to "After swap gain +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resistance for 8s"
Abrams: - Improved misc issues with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20} Seismic Impact collision
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Seismic Impact|Size=20} Seismic Impact can be held for up to 3 seconds. Press the ability again anytime to land.
Haze: - Grey Talon: Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20} Charged Shot being evaded by Haze's Bullet Dance
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger cooldown reduced from 29s to 27s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger T2 cooldown changed from -15s to -13s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb T2 changed to "Replenishes stamina on cast and grants +40% Stamina Regen"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fixation|Size=20} Fixation bonus damage no longer ignores bullet falloff
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20} Bullet Dance cast point reduced from 0.8s to 0.4s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20} Bullet Dance move speed increased from 3.5 to 4
Grey Talon: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20} Charged Shot being evaded by Haze's Bullet Dance
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rain of Arrows|Size=20} Rain of Arrows cooldown increased from 30s to 33s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20} Guided Owl can now explode in the air by pressing the release key
Infernus: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20} Flame Dash duration not being affected by duration extender
Kelvin: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam movespeed limit is now applied via a reduction rather than a speed cap (to allow items to be combined for faster movement like Surge of Power)
Lash: - Fixed it being possible to lose your full lock on with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam sometimes if you look away
McGinnis: - Turret HP scaling reduced from 40% to 30% (affects initial HP too)
- Turret Charge Time reduced from 8s to 6s
- Base Spirit Resist increased from 20% to 25%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
- Heavy {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
Mo & Krill: - You can now cast items and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn while spinning out of Burrow
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20} Combo bonus health per kill increased from 25 to 30
Paradox: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 22s to 24s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20} Paradoxical Swap cooldown increased from 35s to 45s
Pocket: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20} Barrage base damage reduced from 40 to 35
- Fixed a recent change causing {AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20} Enchanter's Satchel to not play damage at the destination when teleporting with Flying Cloak
Seven: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge now uses the new instant cast option that Bebop Bomb uses
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Surge|Size=20} Power Surge spirit scaling increased from 0.1 to 0.2 (new total with T3 is now from 0.5 to 0.6)
Vindicta: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate bonus damage increased from 130 to 145
Yamato: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation now provides 80% Damage Resistance and 80% Debuff Resistance instead of invulnerability during the post-channel buff
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T3 increased from +1s to +1.5s

Silence Glyph: - Updated {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger and Silence Glyph tooltips to clarify that they do not cancel channeling abilities
Headshot Booster: - Fixed various bugs with Headshot Booster and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sharpshooter|Size=20} Sharpshooter
Sharpshooter: - Fixed various bugs with Headshot Booster and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sharpshooter|Size=20} Sharpshooter
Infuser: - Added a new T1 Spirit item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Infuser|Size=20} Infuser
Spirit Lifesteal: Active: Gain 12 Spirit and 20% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20} Spirit Lifesteal for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 35s
- Bullet and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from 15% to 10%
Ammo Scavenger: - Added a new T1 Weapon item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ammo Scavenger|Size=20} Ammo Scavenger
Fire Rate: Passive: Anytime you secure or deny a Soul, you get 2 ammo back and have +20% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate for 4 seconds.

Passive: Pressing the reload key during the halfway point of a reload will cause you to instantly regain your magazine and grant you +30% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal and +15% Fire Rate for 6s. The reload UI has an indicator for the trigger window. Cooldown: 25s

- Passive: Walking through a Cosmic Veil causes you to become invisible with +3 m/s for 4 seconds and grants you +30% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate for your next magazine. Cosmic Veils regenerate any shields you have. Cooldown: 20s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Superior Stamina|Size=20} Superior Stamina: Fire Rate increased from +12% to +15%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Weave|Size=20} Shadow Weave: Ambush Fire Rate increased from +50% to +60%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange T3 changed to "After swap gain +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resistance for 8s"
Active Reload: - Added a new T2 Weapon item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Active Reload|Size=20} Active Reload
Bullet Lifesteal: Passive: Pressing the reload key during the halfway point of a reload will cause you to instantly regain your magazine and grant you +30% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal and +15% Fire Rate for 6s. The reload UI has an indicator for the trigger window. Cooldown: 25s

Melee Charge: - Added a new T2 Weapon item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Melee Charge|Size=20} Melee Charge
Colossus: - Added a new T4 Vitality item, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Colossus|Size=20} Colossus
Healing Rite: - Duration increased from 15s to 17s (total regen increased from 350 to 370)
Extra Charge: - Now grants +7% Cooldown Reduction For Charged Abilities
- No longer grants +6 Spirit to Charged Abilities
Swift Striker: - Negative bullet resist reduced from -6% to -5%
Restorative Locket: - Fixed the max stack limit not being followed
Bullet Resist Shredder: - Bullet Resist Reduction increased from -10% to -12%
- Bullet Resist Reduction duration increased from 5s to 6s

- Spirit Bonus after 2nd jump/dash increased from +20 to +25
Lifestrike: - Heal increased from 40% of damage to 45%
Majestic Leap: - Damage cooldown window increased from 4s to 5s
- Fixed cooldown reduction affecting the damage cooldown
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Singularity|Size=20} Singularity falls 70% slower when Majestic Leap down is used (similar to the hero falling slower normally when casting the ability from an elevation)
Burst Fire: - Now increases your slide distance and duration by 25%
Metal Skin: - Now prevents all weapon damage instead of blocking bullets (this allows procs to go through)
Inhibitor: - Moved from Weapon tree to Vitality
- No longer requires the component {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Bullets|Size=20} Slowing Bullets
Slowing Bullets: - No longer requires the component {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Bullets|Size=20} Slowing Bullets
Crippling Headshot: - Bullet and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spirit Lifesteal|Size=20} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from 15% to 10%
Unstoppable: - Active Spirit Resistance reduced from 40% to 20%
Vampiric Burst: - Can now be cast while busy (such as while you are shooting)
Siphon Bullets: - Max HP Steal increased from 40 to 45
Spiritual Overflow: - Bonus Spirit Power increased from +35 to +40
Frenzy: - Low HP Spirit Resist increased from +25% to +30%
- Fixed tooltip on Spirit Resist missing the %
Shadow Weave: - Ambush {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate increased from +50% to +60%
- Ambush Spirit Power increased from +40 to +55
- Invisibility no longer plays footstep sounds (general change)
- Casting the item immediately puts you into Sprint mode

General: - Added EU servers and matchmaking region. EU testing times are Mon-Thur 5PM to 3AM and Fri-Sun 3PM to 3AM. Times listed are Central European Summer Time (GMT+2).

- Removed the invite requirement of Steam friends having been on your list for a number of days (affected normal user cases often where friends weren't on the Steam list, and we have other metrics and tools on the backend now that we can use to filter for other cases)
- Added search functionality to the shop. You can now search by item name or by individual stat such as 'Ammo', 'Lifesteal', or 'Spirit Power'.
- The game will now let you know when it is safe to abandon (usually if one person has been disconnected for a while)
- Your personal builds are now always sorted to the top of the in-game Builds dropdown
- Various network related improvements when there is packet loss
- Preferred heroes in your roster are now remember on the client across sessions
- Fixed chat wheel not working during the post-game sequence
- Updated the entrance to the underground tunnels from the outer lanes to look more like a subway entrance
- Re-enabled ultra wide UI mode
- Added street names and symbols to the Zipline UI
- Fixed the unit target UI not showing the activation button hint
- Added a Cosmic Veil to the hero demo map
- Added wind sound when on the Zipline
- Rejuv buff is now only granted to the players that are alive. Players that are dead will have their respawn times cut in half from their current values.
- Footsteps are now quieter when obstructed by level geometry
- Dash-Down is now double tap CTRL instead of CTRL+SHIFT
- Vault bounty increased from 300 to 330
- Added another entrance/exit to the underground tunnels from the warehouse interiors
- Enclosed the exterior Medium Neutral Camp with fencing in front of the Theater to match the Amber side Cab Stand
- Added two more veils on each side:
1) Between the Drug Store and the Market on Amber, between the Hotel and Pharmacy on Sapphire
2) Between the exterior Strong Neutral Camps and the outer lane near the T2
